recipes.title: Sticky miso peppers
recipes.ingredients: 1 x 220g tin of pineapple rings in juice, 80g extra firm tofu, 2 mixed-colour peppers, olive oil, 4 spring onions, 4 cloves of garlic, 90g rice vermicelli noodles, 20g wasabi peas, 2 heaped teaspoons red miso paste
instructions: Char pineapple rings and tofu in a dry pan (4 min per side), then remove.
Cook peppers, white spring onions, and garlic in ½ tbsp oil for 10 min.
Prep noodles (soak in boiling water), slice green onions, and crush wasabi peas.
Glaze by mixing miso with pineapple juice, adding to the pan, then returning tofu and pineapple.
Serve noodles topped with peppers, tofu, pineapple, spring onions, and wasabi peas. Enjoy!

recipes.title: Cheat's fish & chips
recipes.ingredients: 800g potatoes, olive oil, 1 rasher of higher-welfare smoked streaky bacon, 100g stale bread, 50g plain flour, 1 large free-range egg, 4 x 125g white fish fillets, skin on, scaled, pin-boned, from sustainable sources, 500g frozen peas, 1 bunch of mint (30g)
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C/425°F/gas 7.
Chop potatoes into wedges, toss with oil and season, then roast for 40 min.
Blitz bacon, bread, and oil into crumbs.
Coat fish in flour, egg, and crumbs, then bake for 15 min.
Boil, drain, and mash peas.
Make mint sauce by pounding mint, vinegar, and oil.
Serve fish and chips with peas and mint sauce.

recipes.title: Halloumi eggy crumpets
recipes.ingredients: 2 large free-range eggs, 2 crumpets, 80g ripe mixed-colour cherry tomatoes, 1 teaspoon hot chilli sauce, ½ a lime, 2 sprigs of coriander, ¼ of a small ripe avocado, olive oil, 8g halloumi cheese
instructions: Beat 1 egg, soak crumpets.
Make salsa by mixing tomatoes, chili sauce, lime juice, and coriander.
Heat oil in a pan, cook remaining egg and crumpets.
Grate and quickly cook halloumi.
Assemble crumpets with salsa and halloumi.

recipes.title: Special scrambled eggs
recipes.ingredients: 4 large free-range eggs, 2 soft buns, 1 red onion, red wine vinegar, olive oil, 1 teaspoon garam masala, 200g ripe tomatoes, ½ a bunch of coriander (15g)
instructions: Whisk and season eggs.
Pickle onion with salt and vinegar.
Fry onion with garam masala for 3 min.
Grate and cook tomatoes until thick.
Toast buns in the pan, spread chutney, and add coriander.
Scramble eggs and serve with pickled onion.

recipes.title: My favourite speedy sausage pizza
recipes.ingredients: 150g self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting, olive oil, 2 higher-welfare Cumberland or veggie sausages, 1 small red onion, 1 sprig of rosemary, 1 heaped tablespoon sun-dried tomato paste, 100g red seedless grapes, 1 x 125g ball of mozzarella cheese, 1 tablespoon pine nuts
instructions: Preheat oven to 240°C.
Mix flour, salt, and water into dough, knead, then roll out.
Cook sausage meat until golden.
Thinly slice onion and mix with rosemary and oil.
Spread tomato paste on dough, top with onions, sausage, grapes, mozzarella, and pine nuts.
Bake for 10 min until crisp.

recipes.title: Mushroom cannelloni
recipes.ingredients: 2 small onions, 2 cloves of garlic, olive oil, 2 leeks, 750g chestnut mushrooms, 75g plain flour, 1 litre semi-skimmed milk, 120g Cheddar cheese, 250g dried cannelloni tubes
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Finely chop onions, garlic, leeks, and mushrooms, then cook for 15 min.
Make sauce by whisking flour into oil, adding milk, and simmering.
Layer sauce and stuffed cannelloni in a tray.
Top with mushrooms, drizzle oil, and bake for 45 min.

recipes.title: My kinda butter chicken
recipes.ingredients: 2–3 fresh mixed-colour chillies, 350g ripe mixed-colour cherry tomatoes, 4 cloves of garlic, 6cm piece of ginger, 1 tablespoon garam masala, 4 heaped tablespoons natural yoghurt, 2 x 150g free-range skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, 2 tablespoons smooth cashew butter
instructions: Char tomatoes and chilies in a hot pan.
Marinate chicken with garlic, ginger, spices, and yogurt.
Cook chicken for 10 min, turning halfway.
Chop chilies, then cook with tomatoes and cashew butter.
Add boiling water, simmer, and return chicken to coat in sauce.
Serve with yogurt and extra chili.

recipes.title: Cauliflower cheese pasta
recipes.ingredients: 100g stale sourdough bread, 2 cloves of garlic, ½ a head of cauliflower (400g), olive oil, 1 onion, 400ml semi-skimmed milk, 300g dried spaghetti, 70g Cheddar cheese
instructions: Blitz bread, garlic, and cauliflower leaves into crumbs, then toast in a pan.
Chop onion and cauliflower, then simmer in milk.
Cook pasta in salted water.
Blend cauliflower mix with cheese into a sauce.
Toss pasta with sauce and serve with crispy crumbs.

recipes.title: Veggie quesadillas
recipes.ingredients: 3 leeks, 3 peppers, 1 large carrot, 140g Cheddar or Red Leicester cheese, optional: a few sprigs of fresh soft herbs, such as parsley, mint, coriander, 8 large flour tortillas, 200g tub of houmous, extra virgin olive oil, 1 lemon or lime, optional: 1 fresh chilli, 120g natural yoghurt, optional: chipotle chilli sauce
instructions: Chop leeks, peppers, and carrot, then mix with grated cheese.
Fill tortillas with mixture and top with another tortilla.
Dry fry quesadillas until golden and crisp.
Mix hummus with oil and lemon.
Slice chili and serve with quesadillas, hummus, and yogurt.

recipes.title: Hero tomato sauce
recipes.ingredients: 4 cloves of garlic, olive oil, 2 fresh red chillies, 1 big bunch of fresh basil (60g), 4 x 400g tins of quality cherry tomatoes
instructions: Fry sliced garlic in oil until golden.
Add halved chilies and torn basil.
Crush tomatoes by hand, add to pan, and simmer for 10–15 min.
Blend or leave chunky, then season.
Use immediately or store.

recipes.title: Tofu fried rice
recipes.ingredients:
6 spring onions

1 x 250g sachet of cooked brown basmati rice

2 heaped teaspoons chilli jam

2 large free-range eggs

150g firm silken tofu
recipes.instructions:
Large non-stick frying pan on a medium-high heat.

Slice the spring onions and fry with 1 tablespoon of olive oil for 1 minute.

Add the rice, chilli jam, a splash of water and a pinch of sea salt and black pepper, then toss for 2 minutes until everything is well coated.

Push the rice to the sides of the pan, making a big well in the middle. Crack the eggs into the well, then use a rubber spatula to start gently moving the eggs around to create big curds.

Break in the tofu, then fold the rice back through the egg until it’s all looking good. Taste and season to perfection.

Lightly oil the inside of a bowl, add the stir-fried rice, gently compacting it with the spatula, then proudly turn out on to a plate.
